results.question: How many vacation days do new employees get?
results.actualAnswer: New employees accrue 10 vacation days per year [c:1 -> New employees accrue 10 vacation days per year].

results.question: What percentage of health insurance premium does the company cover?
results.actualAnswer: The company covers "80% of premium costs" for health insurance for full-time employees [c:1 -> All full-time employees are eligible for health insurance coverage].

results.question: Can I work remotely every day?
results.expectedAnswer: No, remote work is allowed up to 2 days per week
results.actualAnswer: "Remote work is allowed up to 2 days per week with manager approval" [c:1 -> Remote work]. Therefore, you cannot work remotely every day based on the provided policy excerpts.

results.question: What are the standard office hours?
results.expectedAnswer: 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday
results.actualAnswer: The standard office hours are "9:00 AM to 5:00 PM, Monday through Friday." [c:1 -> Standard office hours]

results.question: How much notice do I need to give before resigning?
results.actualAnswer: Employees must provide 2 weeks written notice before resigning [c:1 -> Employees must provide 2 weeks written notice before resigning].

results.question: What is the company's policy on working from home?
results.expectedAnswer: Remote work is allowed up to 2 days per week with manager approval
results.actualAnswer: I could not find this in the policy.

results.question: Do sick days carry over to the next year?
results.expectedAnswer: No, sick days do not accrue and cannot be carried over
results.actualAnswer: Sick days do not accrue and cannot be carried over [c:3 -> Employees receive 5 sick days per year].

results.question: What happens if I violate the confidentiality policy?
results.expectedAnswer: Violation of confidentiality policies may result in immediate termination
results.actualAnswer: If you violate the confidentiality policy, it may result in "immediate termination" [c:3 -> Employees must maintain confidentiality]. Additionally, your "final paycheck will be provided within 30 days of termination" [c:1 -> Immediate termination may occur].

results.question: What is the company's policy on retirement benefits?
results.expectedAnswer: I could not find this in the policy
results.actualAnswer: I could not find this in the policy.

results.question: Can I bring my pet to work?
results.expectedAnswer: I could not find this in the policy
results.actualAnswer: I could not find this in the policy.
